summary: When an exploitation filmmaker goes undercover as a pretentious film snob to obtain proper filming permits, he is thrust into a strange mystery surrounding the very secretive film commission.
cast: Brad Jones|Jake Norvell|Jillian Zurawski|Ryan Mitchelle|Noah Antwiler|Zachary La Voy|Sarah Gobble|Brian Irving|Ed Glaser|David Gobble|Brian Lewis|Orlando Belisle|Josh Sanders|Samantha Allen|Alex Shryock|Kelley Bain
title: The Cinema Snob Movie
